## Usage plot

```{r get-use-plot}
library("ggplot2")
library("dlstats")

x <- cran_stats(c("logging", "lgr"))

if (!is.null(x)) {
  head(x)
  ggplot(x, aes(end, downloads, group=package, color=package)) +
    geom_line() + geom_point(aes(shape=package))
}

````
